description: Executes a command on a shell and returns a reply. The input message must contain a configurable correlation property which is passed back in the reply and can be used to correlate request and reply (i.e. an orderid). The original request is returned via the Timeout output if a timeout occurs.

properties.name: correlationprop
properties.label: Correlation Property Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the property in the request which value is used to correlate request and reply.

properties.name: parameters
properties.label: Shell Command Parameters
properties.description: Provide the shell command parameters. Use {property} for property values of the incoming message.

properties.name: timeout
properties.label: Timeout (Seconds)
properties.description: Provide the timeout of a request in seconds.
